isText.maxLength: The maximum number of character allow,  int
isText.allowChar: Allowed character, str, no need separate, just combine all
isText.rejectChar: String contains invalid characters, str, no need separate, just combine all
isText.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isContains.blackList: word or character that shouldn't exist in the cell, default has already covered %, #, @, $, str separate by comma space
isContains.maxLength: The maximum number of character allow, int
isContains.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isNumeric.allowNegative: Default is False, option allow is true, bool
isNumeric.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isEmail.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isDate.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isDuplicate.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isPrefix.prefix: the word or character that the cell SHOULD start with, str
isPrefix.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

isInOption.options: option that the cell should match, list[str]
isInOption.allowEmpty: Default is false, option allow is true, bool

Bundled.isEmpty: Check if a cell is empty
Bundled.isASCII: check if the cell value contain non-ascii character
